sentence.english: She isn't afraid of bats flying at night.
sentence.spanish: Ella no tiene miedo de los murciélagos volando de noche.

sentence.english: Are they telling stories about the banshee?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cuentan historias sobre la banshee?

sentence.english: He was following a black cat yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él seguía a un gato negro ayer.

sentence.english: I'm not stirring the cauldron for the potion.
sentence.spanish: No remuevo el caldero para la poción.

sentence.english: Were you lighting candles in the haunted house?
sentence.spanish: ¿Encendías velas en la casa encantada?

sentence.english: They are giving out candy to children.
sentence.spanish: Ellos reparten caramelos a los niños.

sentence.english: Does she like eating candy corn?
sentence.spanish: ¿Le gusta comer dulce de maíz?

sentence.english: He wasn't making candy apples for the party.
sentence.spanish: Él no hacía manzanas acarameladas para la fiesta.

sentence.english: Are we walking through the cemetery at night?
sentence.spanish: ¿Caminamos por el cementerio de noche?

sentence.english: She doesn't want to see the open coffin.
sentence.spanish: Ella no quiere ver el ataúd abierto.

sentence.english: Were they wearing scary costumes last Halloween?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevaban disfraces de miedo el pasado Halloween?

sentence.english: The old house looks creepy in the moonlight.
sentence.spanish: La casa vieja parece siniestra a la luz de la luna.

sentence.english: Does he believe in the family curse?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cree en la maldición familiar?

sentence.english: They weren't afraid of the darkness.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no tenían miedo de la oscuridad.

sentence.english: Is she reading a book about death?
sentence.spanish: ¿Lee un libro sobre la muerte?

sentence.english: He doesn't believe in demons.
sentence.spanish: Él no cree en demonios.

sentence.english: I was feeling an eerie presence in the room.
sentence.spanish: Sentía una presencia sobrenatural en la habitación.

sentence.english: Are you telling ghost stories around the fire?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cuentas historias de fantasmas alrededor del fuego?

sentence.english: She wasn't scared by the ghoul in the story.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se asustó por la tumba en la historia.

sentence.english: They are drawing pictures of goblins.
sentence.spanish: Ellos dibujan imágenes de duendes maliciosos.

sentence.english: Does he walk through the graveyard at night?
sentence.spanish: ¿Camina por el cementerio de noche?

sentence.english: He wasn't reading the gravestones carefully.
sentence.spanish: Él no leía las lápidas cuidadosamente.

sentence.english: Are we dressing up as the Grim Reaper?
sentence.spanish: ¿Nos disfrazamos de la Parca?

sentence.english: She doesn't want to enter the haunted house.
sentence.spanish: Ella no quiere entrar en la casa encantada.

sentence.english: Were you staying in a haunted hotel?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te quedabas en un hotel encantado?

sentence.english: They are watching horror movies tonight.
sentence.spanish: Ellos ven películas de horror esta noche.

sentence.english: Does he carve a jack-o'-lantern every year?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tallaba una calabaza cada año?

sentence.english: She wasn't carrying a lantern in the dark.
sentence.spanish: Ella no llevaba una linterna en la oscuridad.

sentence.english: Are you learning magic tricks?
sentence.spanish: ¿Aprendes trucos de magia?

sentence.english: He doesn't live in that old mansion.
sentence.spanish: Él no vive en esa mansión vieja.

sentence.english: I was wearing a scary mask last Halloween.
sentence.spanish: Llevaba una máscara de miedo el pasado Halloween.

sentence.english: Does she enjoy masquerade parties?
sentence.spanish: ¿Disfruta de las fiestas de mascarada?

sentence.english: They weren't afraid of the monster under the bed.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no tenían miedo del monstruo bajo la cama.

sentence.english: Is he dressing up as a mummy this year?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se disfraza de momia este año?

sentence.english: She doesn't believe in ogres from fairy tales.
sentence.spanish: Ella no cree en los ogros de los cuentos de hadas.

sentence.english: Were you brewing potions in science class?
sentence.spanish: ¿Preparabas pociones en la clase de ciencias?

sentence.english: They are buying pumpkins for carving.
sentence.spanish: Ellos compran calabazas para tallar.

sentence.english: Does he think the scarecrow is moving?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cree que el espantapájaros se mueve?

sentence.english: She wasn't finding the movie scary.
sentence.spanish: Ella no encontraba la película de miedo.

sentence.english: Are we using a scythe for the harvest?
sentence.spanish: ¿Usamos una guadaña para la cosecha?

sentence.english: He doesn't have a skeleton costume.
sentence.spanish: Él no tiene un disfraz de esqueleto.

sentence.english: I was drawing a skull on my notebook.
sentence.spanish: Dibujaba una calavera en mi cuaderno.

sentence.english: Does she scream when she sees a spider?
sentence.spanish: ¿Grita cuando ve una araña?

sentence.english: They weren't cleaning the spider webs.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no limpiaban las telarañas.

sentence.english: Is the old forest looking spooky at night?
sentence.spanish: ¿Parece el bosque viejo espeluznante de noche?

sentence.english: She doesn't believe in supernatural events.
sentence.spanish: Ella no cree en eventos sobrenaturales.

sentence.english: Were you feeling terror during the storm?
sentence.spanish: ¿Sentías terror durante la tormenta?

sentence.english: They are giving treats to trick-or-treaters.
sentence.spanish: Ellos dan golosinas a los que piden truco o trato.

sentence.english: Does he play tricks on his friends?
sentence.spanish: ¿Gasta travesuras a sus amigos?

sentence.english: She wasn't going trick-or-treating last year.
sentence.spanish: Ella no iba pidiendo truco o trato el año pasado.

sentence.english: Are we watching a vampire movie tonight?
sentence.spanish: ¿Vemos una película de vampiros esta noche?

sentence.english: He doesn't transform into a werewolf.
sentence.spanish: Él no se transforma en hombre lobo.

sentence.english: Were you reading about witches in history?
sentence.spanish: ¿Leías sobre brujas en historia?

sentence.english: They are learning wizard spells from the book.
sentence.spanish: Ellos aprenden hechizos de mago del libro.

sentence.english: Does she enjoy zombie apocalypse stories?
sentence.spanish: ¿Disfruta de historias de apocalipsis zombi?
